name: Triton, the Prince of Ocean
text:
Enter: You may search for a "Rahab, the Emperor Dragon of Riptide" from your main deck or your hand and put it into your field. This triggers Enter: ability of that card. Then shuffle your main deck.
Activate. Pay 2: This card cannot be attacked until end of turn.
Activate. Pay U2,
T: Gain control of target resonator until end of turn.
